review.comment: 2 year old and I went here a couple times this month. Place is dirty. Not sure if they clean play equipment. No toilet paper or paper towels in the bathroom. We went on a Monday both times so maybe they just needed to stock back up after the weekend. My 2 year old still had fun!
review.review_reply: You are awsome🙂. We appreciate the love and kind words. Our owners are super friendly. We hope to see you soon 😊❤

review.comment:
Kid's Galaxy caught our eye as we searched for a soft play facility for our one-year-old.
It was fantastic and we enjoyed our time there.

First of all, my host, Shazmo, was so kind, willing to meet my needs and asked me a few times if there was anything else I needed. He promptly baked the pizzas, which tasted good. Although I had to ask for the birthday gift they provide as well as utensils, I was allowed to bring things to the party room before my reserved time. They provide a refrigerator for your cake or a freezer for your icecream cake. I do not recall the arcade room being well advertised but it was nice to come upon. The bathrooms were clean but no paper towels are provided, just air dryers. They ask for a $150 desposit to reserve the room and give you a total(if you order extra pizzas, have extra kids, bring in outside food, etc) at the end of your party room time. Anyway, I asked about the %15 percent off sign they had in the front and Shazmo kindly applied it to my total, which was a blessing. I was greeted while leaving, even though it was a few minutes passed closing time. Overall, I recommend birthdays here.
Kids Galaxy gifted my son the perfect party galaxy Oklahoma, which I could neverhave imagined. With their wonderful ambiance and space, my child could celebrate his birthday wholeheartedly.
They don’t have a handicap bathroom, serious issue for my mom. Also food was disgusting. Hate to say it but Chuckie Cheese was a better experience.
review.review_reply: Hello. We are sorry to hear that you had a bad experience. We will look into our bathroom and see if we can make any changes. Usually everyone loves our food. It's freshly made from our kitchen but we will try to be better. Thank you much for coming. Take care.

review.comment:
The indoor playground part is pretty decent compared to some of the others around, and the toddler area while small has its own ball pit and slide.
The arcade area is just insanely loud.
I didn't have any of their food or drinks or anything, but I do think it's extremely strange that a place where normally one parent or caregiver brings a child serves beer.

Kids want to enjoy their birthdays to the fullest. Kids Galaxy offered family entertainment Oklahoma! I could make it up to Steven. Now, my son wants to celebrate his next birthday there! 100% recommended!
As a working parent, the thought of leaving my child in a place really stressed me out. But my friend changed my mind. Thanks, team party galaxy Oklahomafor their wonderful services!
review.review_reply: Thank you for trusting us with your birthday party.

review.comment:
We were having a pretty good experience at first. Kids really enjoyed the play place. It is stated they close at 6 which they confirmed, however at 515 we were the only family in here, they turned off half the lights, turned off the music, and turned off all the arcade games. At 520 we confirmed with them they closed at 6 but had even closed the concession so we could get drink refills.
I really wanted to like this place but probably won’t be coming back
We brought our grandson here on Saturday. He enjoyed it very much. The staff member Justice was very attentive and helpful. Not too crowded with a great price. We will be coming back.

Kid’s Galaxy in Edmond has top-quality play areas for children. Both my daughters can’t stop talking about how much fun they have every time we go there. The playgrounds seem to be maintained well, which is important to me for my kid’s safety.
Kid’s Galaxy is such a large play area! They usually stamp the hands of kids and their parents for security, which I think is great. We will return for sure.
Apart from all the awesome playing equipment for kids, Kid’s Galaxy has good massage chairs, and as a bonus my daughter loves the fresh baked cookies.
What sets Kid’s Galaxy apart is their excellent customer service. The indoor playground is huge, and the arcades are super fun. I would definitely recommend them to my friends and family.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for coming.

review.comment: We had a private party at Kid’s Galaxy for our daughter’s 9th birthday. Overall, it was a great experience. We were there over 3 hours and all of our guests had a great time. Staff was great and very helpful. The kids loved the play areas, arcades and other interactive games.
Good place just hot with and without playing.
Had a great time at kids galaxy. My 6 year olds birthday party was a blast. Food/play area/arcades everything was on point. They now have time cards for unlimited play time on arcades which are cool.
Had good u time, staff so nice. The games alittle pricey but played anyway, can't say no to babies.
No amount of playtime is enough for a 5-year-old, and being a single mom, it's gets hard for me to attend to that. However, Kid's Galaxy is one place I can trust David will have fun.
review.review_reply: That's great. We are happy to have you guys. Thank you for coming guys.

review.comment: Justin loves Kid's Galaxy. He said the had a lot of fun, and the sheer amount of running space he had was enough for him, haha!
From play areas and games to food and staff, kid’s galaxy delivers quality in every aspect. My daughter is very shy, but she had so much fun here and was even able to make friends.

They surely know how to make a birthday special. Full points to the ambiance, food, and fun they provided on my daughter's 6th birthday. Their ‘superstar’ birthday package is reasonably priced and includes a lot. I highly recommend it!
review.review_reply: Thank you for such kind words.  We're always striving to do our best to make every and each birthday party special for parents and the child.  thanks for coming.

review.comment: It is convenient to take my toddler to Kid’s Galaxy after work. It’s like my kid’s home away from home lol.

The playing equipment at kid’s galaxy is so great for keeping kids entertained. The facility is spacious to accommodate enough kids. Both my 3-year old son and 7-year old daughter can’t stop talking about how much fun they have.
Kid’s Galaxy has created such a great place for the little ones. Their indoor space is clean, safe and has really good staff. My 6 year old is always excited for his weekend time there!
Morgan is AWESOME!!!!
Morgan is awesome
Morgan is a dope and fast employee! Give her a raise/bonus please
Really great place, super contained, nice staff.
Super fun, clean, and the staff is great. My kids love the train in the back, and the new games they recently added.
It was a great experience for my daughters 2nd birthday.

I rate this a 3 only because kids had fun but kids have fun anywhere. The pizza tasted like marinara and cardboard. My son cut his finger on the the foam poles by the slides. We went On the kids bash event  for spring break. There  were animal balloons but no face painting the games were expensive to play and  They were understaffed . The bathroom was far down this spooky hallway without any supervision next to kitchen. which I think is dangerous for children.
review.review_reply:
Thank you so much for coming Montessa.  We had a face painting area in our big party room and we a lot of kids got faced painted and we were told that our face painter did a Excellent job we we are so  sorry you missed out on that.

We are shortstaff and we have been actively trying to hire more. Unfortunately we're having the hardest time hiring just like the entire country.
Nevertheless we do appreciate you coming and we hope you had a great time in your next visit. We will definitely talk to our cook to see if we can make our pizza excellent for your next visit. You are appreciated and your business is appreciated.

review.comment: Amazing place to have a birthday party! We reserved it for a private party they closed the playground just for our guest and my son loved it! The staff is amazing! Our host Martina was AMAZING!!!!! Best place to take the kids to get some energy out! This place is my new best place to take my kids!
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for kind words. ☺️

review.comment: Super fun, clean, and the staff is great. My kids love the train in the back, and the new games they recently added.
review.review_reply: Thank you so much for coming.

review.comment: I just had my 9 year old’s birthday party here last weekend, and we had a great time. Our party host was great. I was worried about not having enough time to set up my party room, but they helped us set everything up. I had about 15 minutes to do everything which was plenty of time. Food was good too and I was able to bring my own food as well.
review.review_reply: Glad to hear and thank you for hosting a party with us. We hope to see you soon.

review.comment: Very fun place for kids to play and make new friends. Arcade games are fun too.
I took my grandchildren there this weekend and they had a blast. It was our first time going and I had a good experience. The staff was very helpful and friendly.
Our kids absolutely loved it!

We had our son’s 3rd birthday here last weekend and had a wonderful experience! Highly recommend. The staff was attentive, friendly and accommodating. Kennedy was our party host and did an awesome job helping with whatever we needed! The pizza is fresh and tastes great. The play area is HUGE and provides fun for so many ages. We will definitely be coming back.

I had my twins birthday party here! The room was spacious and clean! It can literally fit over 30 people in there. If you select out of this world package. The host was amazing, and Xavier (the manager) really assisted me with last minute changes. Overall the place is clean and the kids had a blast! Will be coming back.
Thank you for considering my feedback and adding a new party package. A successful business always takes customer feedback and acts on it. Keep up the great work, we will see you guys soon.

Went here for a birthday party and over all it was a good time because my people know how to make it fun where ever they go. With that being said, we probably won't be back. Upper levels should have a weight limit not just "no adults", some mamas need to run up there every now and then with the littles. The toddler zone isn't even set up for toddlers, my poor little guy kept getting his leg stuck in the net trying to get to his tiny slide, then once at the bottom he wasn't able to get out of the ball pit by himself. Half of the machines didn't work(we wasted several tokens), we were told $2 per kid for a train ride that went around a circle 2-3 times then come to find out it was $2.50 per kid.. so idk how the lady didn't know or lied or what?, it was all around not ideal. We've been to some indoor play areas before and never had these issues. This place was extremely over priced for what it is. Not to forget, poor poor employees. Ran into 1 nice employee, in the whole entire place.

We had my sons 4th birthday party here and overall it was good. I will say there were some bumps. They did allow me to set up before the party which was extremely helpful! Everyone was soo nice. Once the party started it was very hard to find my party host because she had other parties going too. I had to ask
Multiple times for refills and things that should have been provided before hand. The pizzas were another thing my package was suppose to come with 3 XL we had over 25 people there. It came with 5 mediums and we had to add 2 more to it. So that was a downer. My over all experience was pleasant but not sure if we will have it again next year based on the availability of the host and the cost. They also forgot the special gift for my little man.
Really amazing for kids
😀kids loved it
